products.title: 10 Bar Mixed Pack
products.body_html:
Why choose a flavor or two when you can get all TEN in one convenient mixed pack?! We put the whole shebang of delicious real food energy bars together in one place for you. Grab a box and give them all a try!

  • 180-190 calories
  • 6-7g plant-based protein
  • Gluten, dairy, soy, and GMO free
  • Some of these contain honey
  • Vegan products can be found here: Vegan Picky Bars

Real food, athletically balanced. Check out our Nutrition Nuggets.

    Our #lifepoints campaign puts photos from our customers on our wrappers. Check it out.

    Ingredients & Nutrition

    For specific nutrition information click here.

    Manufactured on equipment that also processes peanuts, tree nuts, soy, egg and milk. Made with natural ingredients that may contain pit or shell fragments.

    Our #lifepoints campaign puts photos from our customers on our wrappers. To read the stories behind the shots, check the Wrapper Stories.

products.body_html:
Our most popular flavor, this fudgey goodness tastes more like a peanut butter brownie than an energy bar should. Ready to fuel a workout or sweet tooth craving, dive in for a real chocolate fix.

  • 190 calories, 7g protein.

  • Gluten, dairy, soy, and GMO free. Vegan!

peanuts, dates*, tapioca syrup*, brown rice*, cocoa powder (Dutch alkalized), semi­sweet chocolate chips (sugar, chocolate liquor, cocoa butter), rice protein, sea salt, brown rice syrup*, mixed tocopherols (natural vitamin E). (*organic)

#lifepoints are the moments when you're living life right. This wrapper is inspired by a photo from No Name Lake on Broken Top by the unofficial “Duchess of Bend” Zoe Roy (@zoeeroy).

products.title: Call of the Wild Blueberry (Grain-free)
products.body_html:
This wild new addition to the Performance Granola family is something special. Made with chickpea flakes instead of rolled oats, it's the grain-free (NOT carb-free) toppable, snackable, spoon-it-by-the-bowlable granola you've been waiting for.

Unlike most grain-free granolas, this has a light and crunchy texture thanks to the chickpea flakes, which also balance the macronutrients instead of leaning heavy into a fat bomb. Tossed in satiating almond butter with pumpkin, chia, and sunflower seeds throughout for long lasting energy. Dried blueberries give a pop of flavor followed by the subtle sweetness of maple, and finally a hint of dried rosemary for a surprisingly fresh finish.

  • 10 snack servings / 5 bowl servings per bag
  • Gluten, grain, dairy, soy, GMO-free
  • Vegan
  • Only 4g added sugar (per snack serving)
  • Balanced complex carbs, satiating fats, easy-to-digest protein

Ingredients
Chickpea Flakes, Maple Syrup, Sunflower Seeds, Almond Butter, Tapioca Starch, Pumpkin Seeds, Sunflower Oil, Wild Blueberries, Chia Seeds, Sea Salt, Dried Rosemary.

Produced in a facility that uses peanuts, tree nuts, and soy.

Nutrition Facts
serving size: snack 1/3 cup (30g) amount per serving: calories 140, total fat 7g (9% dv), sat. fat 1g (5% dv), trans fat 0g, cholesterol 0mg, sodium 90mg (4% dv), total carb. 15g (5% dv), fiber 2g (7% dv), total sugars 6g (inc. 4g added sugar) (8% dv), protein 4g, vit. d 0mg (0% dv), calcium 33mg (2% dv), iron 1mg (6%), potas. 162 mg (4% dv)

products.title: Can't Beet Chocolate
products.body_html:
Can't Beet Chocolate Performance Oatmeal Multi Serve bag has gotten bigger. The 4 serving multi-serve bags have increased in size to an 8 serving multi-serve bag.

Oatmeal is typically not a “pretty” food (despite its frequent presence on Instagram…) but this is NOT that beige and boring bowl of mush. Vibrant magenta thanks to organic beetroot powder with ribbons of dark chocolate goodness, this bowl of oats is close-up AND workout ready. Cacao powder gives a rich yet not overly sweet balance to the nitrate-rich beets (hello, endurance boost!), while chia seeds and almonds give a crunch and extra antioxidant punch.

  • Non-GMO

  • Gluten, dairy, and soy free

  • Vegan

  • 10g protein

  • $15.99/ea SRP

Cooking instructions: Add hot water. Wait *patiently* for three minutes.

Ingredients
Organic Gluten free Oats, Dates, Chia Seeds, Almonds, Organic Chocolate Chips (Organic Cane Sugar, Organic Cocoa Liquor, Organic Cocoa Butter), Organic Beet Powder, Coconut Sugar, Cacao Powder, Sea Salt

Contains tree nuts (almonds). Produced in a facility that uses peanuts and soy.

products.title: Can't Beet Chocolate Pop-Up Cup
products.body_html:
Oatmeal is typically not a “pretty” food (despite its frequent presence on Instagram…) but this is NOT that beige and boring bowl of mush. Vibrant magenta thanks to organic beetroot powder with ribbons of dark chocolate goodness, this bowl of oats is close-up AND workout ready. Cacao powder gives a rich yet not overly sweet balance to the nitrate-rich beets (hello, endurance boost!), while chia seeds and almonds give a crunch and extra antioxidant punch.

products.title: Drizzle- Almonds, Cinnamon, & Maca 6.5oz
products.body_html:
"How dare you make a product that tastes this good." - sarah k

Flavor
Look, when we set out to make the put-it-on-everything food accessory of our dreams, we weren't messing around. Drizzle is impossibly smooth and sweet, thanks to the stoneground sprouted almonds and a touch of coconut sugar. Cinnamon, vanilla, and superfood maca balance out the flavor with a bit of warmth and spice, making it perfect for stirring into oatmeal, dipping fruit into, drizzling over ice cream, or eating straight from the jar.

We're calling it a "luxurious mouth party," and you're invited.

  • Gluten-free, dairy-free, soy-free, GMO-free
  • Vegan
  • Made with organic ingredients
  • 100% ridiculously good

* Disclaimer: We're not currently accepting complaints about the recommended serving size. We don't personally agree that a serving isn't = a jar either, but someone needs to be the adult around here. (It's the FDA. The FDA is the adult.)

Ingredients
Organic Almonds, Organic Coconut Sugar, Organic Maca, Organic Cinnamon, Organic Vanilla

Made on equipment that processes hazelnuts, almonds, cashews, sesame, coconut, and sunflower.

Nutrition Facts
Serving Size: 2 Tbsp (30g), Amount Per Serving: Calories 150, Total Fat 10g (13%DV), Saturated Fat 1g (4% DV), Trans Fat 0g, Cholest. 0mg (0% DV), Sodium 0mg (0% DV), Total Carb. 15g (5% DV), Fiber 3g (9% DV), Total Sugars 9g (includes 9g added sugars (18% DV)), Protein 4g (8% DV), Vitamin A (0% DV), Vitamin C (2% DV), Vitamin E (35% DV), Calcium (4% DV), Iron (4% DV), Potassium (4% DV). Percent Daily Values (DV) are based on a 2,000 calorie diet.

products.title: How ‘bout Dem Apples?
products.body_html:
A top shelf upgrade to the classic! We amped up our version of this favorite with spicy ginger and energizing chia seeds for maximum cardiovascular, skeletal, and muscular benefit. (They’re full of protein, omega 3s, and fiber, plus a host of other antioxidant and anti-inflammatory goodness.) Toss in almonds, date bits, and a little sprinkle of coconut sugar, and you’ve got a familiar yet fancified bowl of oats that’ll power you through whatever your day has in store. How bout dem apples?

  • Non-GMO

  • Gluten, dairy, and soy free

  • Vegan

  • 10g protein

  • $15.99/ea SRP

Cooking instructions: Add hot water. Wait *patiently* for three minutes.

products.title: PB&J All Day Granola
products.body_html:
Who doesn't love peanut butter and jelly? Our Performance Granola (created with Elyse Kopecky) is ready for spooning by the bowlful, as a topping, or munching straight from the bag. Crunchy oat + nut clusters pop with tangy berries, rounded out with ground flax and satiating virgin coconut oil.

And you don’t even have to choose between strawberry or raspberry jam.

  • Gluten, dairy, soy, GMO-free

  • Only 5g added sugar (per serving)

  • Jazzed up with mineral-rich nuts and seeds and berries

  • Balanced complex carbs, satiating fats, easy-to-digest protein

  • 10 servings per bag

  • $8.99/ea SRP

    Real food, athletically balanced. Check out our Nutrition Nuggets.

    gluten free oats, honey*, peanut butter, cashews, sunflower seeds, virgin coconut oil, freeze-dried strawberries, freeze-dried raspberries, ground flax, sea salt, Red Ape® cinnamon*. (*organic)

products.title: POP Box
products.body_html: Display your Picky Bars in style with one of our wooden POP Boxes. Holds approximately 24 bars. Maximum per account is 2, please contact us if you need more.

products.title: Ready to Rumble Apple Crumble
products.body_html:
Ready to Rumble Apple Crumble has the spiced, comforting flavors of a baked apple dessert, in the light, crunchy, totally snackable form of granola. Our Performance Granolas are nutritionally balanced to give your munch a little more punch, with satiating healthy fats, lower added sugar, and a huge serving of flavor. Dive into this cinnamon’y apple concoction, chock-full of almonds, sunflower seeds, and pepitas, with hints of maple and cardamom rounding out the just-pulled-from-the-oven taste. Top it on ice cream for a reverse a la mode, or pour a bowl with milk to start your day on the right foot. You know what they say about an apple a day...

  • Gluten, dairy, soy, GMO-free, vegan
  • Only 4g added sugar (per serving)
  • Balanced complex carbs, satiating fats, easy-to-digest protein
  • 10 servings per bag


Real food, athletically balanced. Check out our Nutrition Nuggets.

Ingredients
organic gluten free oats, maple syrup, almonds, sunflower seeds, sunflower oil, tapioca starch, almond butter, pumpkin seeds, dried apples, cardamom, sea salt, cinnamon.

Produced in a facility that uses peanuts, tree nuts, and soy.

Nutrition Facts
serving size: 1/3 cup (30g) amount per serving: calories 140, total fat 7g (9% dv), sat. fat 1g (5% dv), trans fat 0g, cholesterol 0mg, sodium 50mg (2% dv), total carb. 15g (5% dv), fiber 2g (7% dv), total sugars 5g (inc. 4g added sugar) (8% dv), protein 3g (7% dv), vit. d 0mg (0% dv), calcium 17mg (2% dv), iron 1mg (6%), potas. 93 mg (2% dv)

Plus, everyone knows the second child's always a little sassy...

products.title: Trail Mix Fix Oatmeal
products.body_html:
Bigger bag. Bigger impact.

Trail Mix Fix Performance Oatmeal is here to satisfy all your fruity, nutty, and chocolatey cravings, now in a bigger resealable bag! With 8 servings of easy-to-prep, nutrient dense, and subtly delicious oatmeal (great hot or cold!), we've got breakfast covered well past your next grocery run. It's our best bang for your breakfast buck yet.

  • 280 calories / 8g plant protein / 6g added sugar
  • Gluten, dairy, soy, GMO, and nut free*
  • Vegan
  • Just-add-water prep
  • Please note: Current Packaging does not contain a UPC


Cooking instructions: Add hot water. Wait *patiently* for three minutes.

To learn more about why we developed Trail Mix Fix and how it went from concept to reality in just three weeks, watch CEO Jesse's video above.

*Produced in a facility that uses peanuts, tree nuts, and soy. Prop 65 Warning for California Residents

Serving Size (70g), Amount Per Serving: Calories 300, Total Fat 10g (13%DV), Sat Fat 2.5g (10% DV), Trans Fat 0g (0%), Cholest. 0mg (0% DV), Sodium 200mg (9% DV), Total Carb. 44g (16% DV), Fiber 8g (29% DV), Total Sugars 14g (includes 7g added sugars (14% DV)), Protein 9g, Vitamin D 0mcg (0% DV), Calcium 75mg (6% DV), Iron 4mg (20% DV), Potassium 395 mg (6% DV). Percent Daily Values (DV) are based on a 2,000 calorie diet.


Contains tree nuts (almonds). Produced in a facility that uses peanuts and soy.
